summary:
iTRUST Token (ITC) - iTRUST Token (ITC) is an asset that will work hard to kick rogue developers off the network.

 Security against scammers - iTRUST Token (ITC) has emerged as the most secure and trusted community token in the cryptocurrency world.

 The Token of the Future - iTRUST is a project based on the Binance Smart Chain, developed by the community to revolutionize the space of meme coins and secure tokens.

 iTrust's objectives - Become a reference and meeting point for investors in the crypto world.

Having your security as the main point of reference for new BSC network projects.

Generate results for your investors.

Always innovate, be a reference to support and strengthen the crypto market.

Create a scammer and bad project repudiation token elaborated in the bsc network.

Token with 100% security for its investors.

To be a tool opening space for the strengthening of projects.

Offer the best experience for your holders and partners.

 Tokenomics - Name: iTRUST
Abbreviation: ITC
Supply: 1,000,000,000 (one billion)
Rates: 5/5
5% in purchase and sale being distributed proportionally to the project holders
